sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import '../styles/news.css' export default function News(){ var [news,setNews]=useState([]) var [sources,setSources]=useState([]) var [CNNnews,setCNNnews]=useState([]) var [foxNews,setFoxNews]=useState([]) var [BBCnews,setBBCnews]=useState([]) var [googleNews,setGoogleNews]=useState([]) function getNewsByCategory(e){ axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/top-headlines/category/${e.target.value}/in.json`) .then((res)=>{ setNews(res.data.articles) }) } axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/everything/cnn.json`) .then((res)=>{ setCNNnews(res.data.articles) }) axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/everything/fox-news.json`) .then((res)=>{ setFoxNews(res.data.articles) }) axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/everything/bbc-news.json`) .then((res)=>{ setBBCnews(res.data.articles) }) axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/everything/google-news.json`) .then((res)=>{ setGoogleNews(res.data.articles) }) axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/sources.json`) .then((res)=>{ setSources(res.data.sources) }) return( <>

Our Sources:

{sources.map((x)=>{x.name}, )} etc.
<>

Latest from CNN

{CNNnews.map((x)=> <>
  • {x.title}

    {x.description}

    • )}
    <>

    {foxNews.map((x)=> <>
  • {x.title}

    {x.description}

    • )}
    <>

    {BBCnews.map((x)=> <>
  • {x.title}

    {x.description}

    • )}
    <>

    Latest from Google News

    {googleNews.map((x)=> <>
  • {x.title}

    {x.description}

    • )}
    {news.map((x)=>
    {x.title}
    )}
    ); }
